sentences.en: And the education that move and we exist in reality is antipathetic bewildering phenomenon.
sentences.cn: 而现实中存在着和我们的教育格格不入又令人困惑的现象。

sentences.en: But his husband, thick hair of a lofty, heavy, pipe does not leave buccal man as Nancy as this however " elfland " antipathetic.
sentences.cn: 但是他的丈夫，一个高大、浓眉粗发、烟斗不离口的男人却与这个女性化的“仙境”格格不入。

sentences.en: He is antipathetic ( al ) to dogs.
sentences.cn: 他生来 厌恶 狗.

sentences.en: He is antipathetic to new ideas.
sentences.cn: 他天生就封新观念起反感.

sentences.en: He was antipathetic to any change.
His attitude is antipathetic to me.
Swanson was not heated or antipathetic.
sentences.cn: 斯万生并不发火,也不现出反感.

sentences.en: The whole place and everything about it was antipathetic to her ( Anthony Trollope )
sentences.cn: 整个地方和它所有的事物都令她反感 ( 安东尼特罗洛普 )

words.tran_cn: 令人厌恶的,令人不快的

trans.tran_en: having a very strong feeling of disliking or opposing someone or something
